titles.title: For the relief of James A. Strickland.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Immigration and Claims.

bill.summary: 10/12/1995--Introduced. Directs the Secretary of the Treasury to pay a specified sum to a named individual representing the amount paid by the individual to his attorney for services rendered in connection with attempts to obtain standby pay from the Veterans Administration for work as a radiology technologist.
